title: 【置頂】英文文宣 推灰衣狗上國際！！！！！

replies.msg:
Police disguised as protestor tries to lead Hong Kong protestors into charging through police blockade

On Thursday night, 27th of June, a group of peaceful protestors of Hong Kong surrounded the District Police Headquarter. While the group of over thousand protestors has made the agreement not to step over police’s blockade surrounding the headquarter; a grey-clothed man tried to talk the protestors into charging through the blockade. The man, not wearing mask like the vast protestors did, used a hoe-like object to hit the chains wrapping the gate; ignoring the objection of all other protestors.

The man, finding that he failed persuading, made a call. A while later a gate of the headquarter opened and police inside let the man enter. Given the circumstances, the man is very likely a plainclothes police.

The man was then identified as the person kicking protestors’s supplies earlier the day.

This is how shameful Hong Kong police force is. Sending a disguised policeman trying to persuade the peaceful protestors into committing offence, and thus gives the police force the reason to clear out the protestor group.

We need your attention. Help us on G20.
freedomhk.net
推

【事實】灰衫警沒帶委任證衝向警總鐵閘並持起棍狀物件。在場人士一度以為其身份為示威者，幸沒有示威者跟隨。最後總部內警員開閘護送進入。

其他示威者亦 合 理 懷 疑 該名警員企圖帶動示威者衝擊警總。

頭先copy一位巴打 大家請廣傳
